Plot.ly Env

1. Plots with Plot.ly

You need to add the :page-plotly: true attribute to the adoc page

import plotly.graph_objects as go
import numpy as np

x = np.linspace(0, 10, 100)
y = np.sin(x)

fig = go.Figure(data=go.Scatter(x=x, y=y, mode='lines'))
fig.show()
